title: AB 467
content: The people of the State of California enact the following. Section 12519 of the Health and Safety Code is amended to define a "model rocket" as a toy or educational device weighing up to 1500 grams, propelled by a model rocket motor and meeting specific safety standards. Section 12520 is also amended to define a "model rocket motor" as a rocket propulsion device using commercially manufactured solid propellant. Section 12565 is also amended. Section 12565 of the Health and Safety Code is amended to classify fireworks or toy propellent devices containing pyrotechnic compositions as model rocket motors. Section 12602 states that a license is not required for the retail sale, use, or discharge of certain fireworks and devices. Section 12632 establishes license fees for manufacturing model rocket motors. Section 12634 is also amended. Section 12634 of the Health and Safety Code is amended to state that a separate license for manufacturing agricultural and wildlife fireworks or model rocket motors is not required if a license for other fireworks activities has been issued. Section 12640 requires a valid permit from the State Fire Marshal or local agency before performing certain activities related to dangerous fireworks. Manufacturing, selling, and transporting various types of fireworks, including safe and sane, agricultural, wildlife, and model rocket motors, is regulated. It is illegal to discharge dangerous fireworks in public or advertise to sell any class of fireworks without a valid license or permit. Section 12722 of the Health and Safety Code is amended to allow for the seizure of various types of fireworks that are not properly examined, classified, and registered by the State Fire Marshal. This includes fireworks sold without the required labeling, imported fireworks without proper notices filed, and safe and sane fireworks stored or sold in violation of permit conditions. Safe and sane fireworks sold at retail without State Fire Marshal label or firing instructions, before or after specified dates, or without approved fuse protection caps. The curr_chunk lists prohibited activities related to dangerous fireworks, model rockets, emergency signaling devices, and pyrotechnic devices.
